biotools.summary: Accepts a multiple species nucleotide alignment file as input, iteratively runs the Primer3 application for each sequence, and then collates the results to identify a set of polymerase chain reaction (PCR) primers that will bind across the alignment.

bioschemas.name: Primaclade
bioschemas.summary: Accepts a multiple species nucleotide alignment file as input, iteratively runs the Primer3 application for each sequence, and then collates the results to identify a set of polymerase chain reaction (PCR) primers that will bind across the alignment.
